sentences.en: Chess has long been regarded as a measure of intellect.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋长久以来被认为是智慧的体现。

sentences.en: Do the emotions develop in parallel with the intellect?
sentences.cn: 情感与智力是并行发展的吗？

sentences.en: He combined a formidable intellect with a talent for speaking.
sentences.cn: 他不但智力超群，而且口才出众。

sentences.en: He didn't just fight back, he dominated, using skill and intellect.
sentences.cn: 他不是单纯地同自然作斗争, 而是用技巧和智慧来主宰它.

sentences.en: He has a zest for life and a quick intellect.
sentences.cn: 他对生活充满热情，思维敏捷。
他从不炫耀自己有多聪明.

sentences.en: His intellect and mental agility have never been in doubt.
sentences.cn: 他的才智和机敏从未受到怀疑。

sentences.en: I had finally met my match in power and intellect.
sentences.cn: 我终于遇上了与我在力量与智力上不相上下的劲敌。

sentences.en: I was intrigued by him, stirred by his intellect.
sentences.cn: 我被他的聪明才智所打动，对他产生了好奇心。

sentences.en: In short, he was as good as his intellect conceived.
sentences.cn: 简言之, 他照自己的理解是个好人.

sentences.en: It is not often that one so young has such a giant intellect.
sentences.cn: 年纪这样轻、智力又如此高的人可不多.

sentences.en: My boss isn't a great intellect.
sentences.cn: 我的老板才智并不出众。

sentences.en: Newton is a man of great intellect.
The intellect is not the most important thing in life.
sentences.cn: 才智不是生活中最重要的东西。

sentences.en: The members of the committee described Gates as a man of keen intellect.
sentences.cn: 委员会委员把盖茨描述为才智过人。

words.tran_cn: 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的
可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的
知识分子；凭理智做事者
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力

trans.tran_cn: 智力，理解力，有才智的人，知识分子
trans.tran_en: the ability to understand things and to think intelligently
